Articles.Content: I am ready for my first Lunar mission. The only thing is... ROVERS! Like Apollo 17 etc. And maybe better looks for the lander but ROVER. I need a compact way to transport a rover on a lander with little to no flight performance disturbances. Not requesting, just taking advice. Pic of lander I'll post later.

Get KIS and build one in-situ, or, latch it to the side of your lander with a counterweight on the opposite side. May be bring 2 of the same rovers attached radially.

Another option, attach your engines radially and carry the rover under the lander.
